Articles.Content:
Check this out:

Interstellar Marines

It looks like a game that has some very realistic graphics and sounds and it inmerses you in its atmosphere.

pretty cool.

What do you think?
Well, I thought about buying it on steam, but it seems to me, that right now, they have allmost nothing to show other than ideas. Maybe they'll get my money later. Right now it didn't convince me....
I've been subscribed to their newsletter for a while, it looks fantastic and I can't wait to see the final result!
